patthana9.7:1.1: Nahetuñceva naahetukañca nakusalaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nahetu ceva naahetuko ca nakusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Nahetuñceva naahetukañca nakusalaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca naahetuko ceva nana ca hetu nakusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Nahetuñceva naahetukañca nakusalaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nahetu ceva naahetuko ca nakusalo ca naahetuko ceva nana ca hetu nakusalo ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā.
patthana9.7:2.1: Naahetukañceva nana ca hetuṁ nakusalaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca naahetuko ceva nana ca hetu nakusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … tīṇi.
patthana9.7:3.1: Nahetuñceva naahetukañca nakusalañca naahetukañceva nana ca hetuṁ nakusalañca dhammaṁ paṭicca nahetu ceva naahetuko ca nakusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … tīṇi. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
patthana9.7:5.1: Nahetuñceva naahetukañca naakusalaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nahetu ceva naahetuko ca naakusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
patthana9.7:7.1: Nahetuñceva naahetukañca naabyākataṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nahetu ceva naahetuko ca naabyākato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
